subject: Throttle Pedal
description_text:
Order#: SSN2357
Hello,
I received my package with one issue, I am not receiving any feedback/input from my throttle. There is a spring loose in bottom portion of the pedal with broken black plastic (attached photo) where the blue rubber stop is. The brake works fine. 
I would like to request a replacement. Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi jeffery Gallimore,    We apologise for the inconvenience caused. We will send you a new throttle as a replacement. We sincerely apologise!
Hi jeffery Gallimore,      This is your logistics tracking link.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045866965961
